trainable.custom_layers.ConvNeXtV2_block¶

trainable.custom_layers.ConvNeXtV2_block(filters, l1=None, l2=None)¶

ConvNeXtV2 block from https://arxiv.org/pdf/2301.00808.pdf

Parameters

  • filters – channels in the input and output of the convolution

  • l1 – l1 regularization weight

  • l2 – l2 regularization weight

Returns

a keras layer
